name: Cybersecurity Advisers Network
goal:
CyAN aims to strengthen cybersecurity and fight against cybercrime through a multi-disciplinary approach based on mutual trust among its members and on complementarity of their profiles and experiences.

CyAN aims to contribute to the definition, development, distribution and publication of concepts, doctrines and standards in line with its ambitions in favor of a safer world. It shall be a source of proposals towards national public authorities and international institutions on issues related to cybersecurity and fight against cybercrime (legislative and regulatory developments, partnership, establishment of best practicesâ€¦).

Our purpose is also to support our members through exchanges of good practices, expertise, connections, cooperation and assistance in any circumstances.
interests: Borders and Security, Digital economy and society, Foreign affairs and security policy, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Cybersecurity and fight against cybercrime, including data Protection, e-privacy, fake news, hate speech, fraud...
